data.title: Fix TS building artwork offsets.
data.body: Closes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/9003.

data.title: Fix the build after a bad merge
data.body: Merging #9187 without rebasing it on post-#9182 bleed was a bad idea.

data.title: AudLoader LoadSound method doesn't properly support stereo aud files.
data.body:
Stereo aud files (at least those usable by TD/RA) use an interleaved format where every other byte contains two samples from alternating left and right channels. To decode this correctly into interleaved PCM, the two samples per byte need separating and the two channels also need to be decoded using separate variables for index, offset and currentSample.

Although no aud files made by WW exist in this format for either TD or RA, there are now improved quality scores that are in this format.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/26384985-audloader-loadsound-method-doesn-t-properly-support-stereo-aud-files?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Fix misc D2k BodyOrientation-regressions.
Fix Namespace definition
data.body: This Pr fixes a typo in a namespace definition.

data.title: OpenRA.Utility is broken... (make check)

One of the recently merged Prs is the reason which brokes this utility. 
Also 
`Script ObjectWrapper.cs` has as far i and penev has seen a namespace named `OpenRA.RA.Common.Scripting`

but which is not the reason why it is crashing.

data.title: StoppingNatDiscovery: Catch unhandled Exceptions.
data.body:
this Pr is fixing a crash which can happen when NAT discovery problems occour or underlaying errors in the Mono.Nat framework are happening. For this point we cant do more otherwise we implementing our own stack for this. :/

Fixes #8794.

data.title: Implement HackyAI->UnitLimits.
data.body:
Fixes #8823.
Fixes #6695.

data.title: Fix veinholes.
data.body: Another `BodyOrientation`-related regression, this time only A River Runs Near It is affected - no other maps have veins atm.

data.title: Add customizable properties to observer clocks.
data.body: I need help here though - the properties ain't read from the yaml (neither does the `Icon*`s, checked).

data.title: Adds IncludeAllies option to hide-map crate.
data.body:
1) Adds an IncludeAllies variable to HideMapCrateAction.
2) Doesn't set the chance of getting hide-map crate as zero when player has fog visibility. Instead, player can get it but it has no effect. This works better with maps that have custom selection shares.

data.title: Red Alert: Adds satellite icons to badger planes.
data.body: They drop crates, paratroopers and parabombs. This is split from #9096.

data.title: Ensure that we have a working OpenGL Context.
data.body:
This PR adds an missing error check to the SDL2/OpenGL context creation. When something goes wrong with SDL and OpenGL it will crash...

```
Platform is Windows
Using SDL 2 with OpenGL renderer
Desktop resolution: 1920x1080
No custom resolution provided, using desktop resolution
Using resolution: 1920x1080
Detected OpenGL version: 4.5
```

data.title: Fix Crash and Typo in UpgradeManager
data.body:
This PR fixes a crash in UpgradeManager when invalid Data (null) in up.upgradetypes was stored. There are 2 other locations where this GetorAdd is used but these are integers.

fixes #7668

data.title: Move NAT Logic from ClientTooltipLogic into its own Function at LobbyUtils.
data.body:
This PR is fixing a Crash when the Client has problems to get the IP-Adress from the NAT Devices.

fixes #8787

data.title: Fixed the TS mod crashing on startup and oh trains!
data.body: :bullettrain_side:

data.title: Added the Tiberium active overlay animation
data.body: blowing spores in the air.

data.title: Fix TD tower selection boxes and improve TS sequence offsets
data.body:
- Fixes that the Obelisk and AGT in TD only have 24x24 visual selection boxes.
- Improves offsets of TS Adv. Nod Power Plant and GDI Comm. Center. This does NOT fix the offset issues on "A River Runs Near It", but makes them more accurate everywhere else.

data.title: Improved WithCargo performance
data.body:
Closes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/9183.

Also moved it to Mods.Common as this can be used everywhere.

data.title: Move DEB packaging to Ubuntu PPA
data.body:
They will then run in a clean VM similar to official packages which enhances quality. Also people get a repository for automatic updates. We can also add dependencies like libSDL2 for old LTS versions there.

Interested people in maintaining this can have a look at https://launchpad.net/~openra-developers
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/26306502-move-deb-packaging-to-ubuntu-ppa?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>
